alert.note: Alert for Greeley; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 09 at 7:11PM CDT until September 09 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CHEYENNE COUNTY IN EAST CENTRAL COLORADO... SOUTHWESTERN WALLACE AND NORTHWESTERN GREELEY COUNTIES IN WEST CENTRAL KANSAS... At 611 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Weskan, or 18 miles east of Cheyenne Wells, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Cheyenne County in east central Colorado, southwestern Wallace and northwestern Greeley Counties in west central Kansas. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
